institution: National Bureau of Economic Research Inc
award_title: CAREER: Understanding Geoecoconomic Factors for Achieving Geopolitical and Economic Objectives
subject: Making quantitative models reusable
body:
Estimation pipelines with multiple stages—data construction, calibration, counterfactuals—rarely get reused. Others can't easily reproduce your workflow or build on your estimated parameters.

I built Ouro as a thin API over computational work so researchers can call your methods directly instead of fighting with replication packages.

Worth a quick chat? Taking a break for holidays, so no rush.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
